events.name: Siebren De Kuiper is Born
events.description: On March 15th of 2015, Siebren de Kuiper was Born. Growing in the Netherlands fascinated by the universe and its mysteries, oblivious to the impact he would leave in the world, and the price he would ultimately pay for his hubris

events.name: Reinhardt Wilhelm is Born
events.description: On June 26th of 2015, Reinhardt Wilhelm was born to a working class family in Stuttgrat, growing up dreaming of knights of old and their chivalry adventures. He would grew up to join the German Armed Forces to pursue his childhood dreams

events.name: Ana Amari is Born
events.description: On January 1st of 2017, Ana Amari was born to a line of distinguished army Veterans in Cairo. Learning how to handle a rifle since very young and becoming a marksperson by high school. Once graduated she would join the El-Sa'ka forces

events.name: Gabriel Reyes is Born
events.description: On December 14th of 2018 Gabriel Reyes is born. Raised In Los Angeles by a family of hispanic descent, he would spend his early days helping the family in a convenience Store. He would go on to graduate in criminology and pursue law enforcment as part of the LAPD

events.name: Torbjörn Lindholm is Born
events.description: On September 21st of 2019 Torbjörn Lindholm Is born in the city of Gothenburg. He was a bright mind since an early age and had a clear careeer path in mind, as he pursued multipled advanced degrees in university.

events.name: Medical Miracles
events.description:
During the Early years of the 21st century, the rapid climate change and growing populations would lead to a series of pandemics across the World. From yellow fever to dengue, patogens were becoming an ever evolving problem. 
But with hardship and challenges comes progress, and humanity was able to collaborate into speeding vaccine development, allowing for massive leaps in the medical field, and a period of utopian levels of health and life expectancy.

As technology Advanced, Dr. Elaine Esat would introduce the world to the marvels of cybernetics, empowering humans with mechanical organs and limbs that would later becoming a global stnadard, as companies such as Ogundimu Synergies Inc. and Omnica Corp quickly made a name for themselves in the global robotis sphere.

events.name: Crystal Clear
events.description:
Dr. Leonel Namuaca was working on a revolutionary device, which thanks to nanofiltration systems, managed to greatly improve the cleansing of water from polluted and non potable sources. Inspired by his life of struggle as climate change forced his family away from home, his purifiers quicklhy took over the world, helping to stop waterborne ilness, and improving water efficiency on regions where it was scarse.

His work was later used by Michael Lomakema, who realized purification alone coulnd't do much in the absence of water. And he engineered alongside his college deparment in the Great Basin Desert, a home printable water extractor, which combined with Namuaca's technology, allowed peopleto get clearn water essentially out of tin air, extracted from any degree of humidity.

The work of these  two men forever changed the world as we knew it, and would eventually be the key to take humanity to the stars and Beyond

events.name: John Francis Morrison is Born
events.description: Born on January 27th of 2021, John "Jack" Francis Morrison was raised by farmers, and grw up to become a rambunctious teen. When he was not helping in the farm, he spent his time playing football, and by his eighteenth brithday he would choose to enlist in the army, Intending to put the stenght and discipline from his years of athletism into good use

events.name: Algae Hydroponics
events.description:
As technology progressed, many fields of science quickly solved global issues such as illness and water scarcity, but it quickly becameclear that the worsening climate of the planet would become the next major obstacle to surpass. Scientists all over the globe scrambled for ideas to produce cost effective clean energy that could become a world wide standard. 

Dr. Justina Borda was one of the first to tackle this issue. A phycologist specialized on genetics, who saught to improve energy equity on her home of Colombia. Borda developed a strain of algae capable of thriving in low oxygen waters, and photosynthesizing at disproportional speeds. and after many attempts, she was able to get the energy produced by the algae to work alongside a Goldilocks Generator, taking the excess of electricity fromthe algae and essentially transforming any body of water into a sola panel.

Borda's invention spread across the world rapidly, as rural communities quickly standarized its used, to the point that even the most remote corners of the world have bodies of water where here creation managed to propagate. As her invention became the norm, the public moved away from fossil fuels for their daily energy conssumption.

Borda kickstarted a green energy revolution, and as superstorms became all the more common, the wind energy industry followed, which ultimately lead to a decrease in carbon emissions of  more than 20 percent during this period, giving Humanity hope for a better tomorrow

events.name: Vivian Chase is Born
events.description:
On January 12th of 2028, Vivian Chase and her twin Valentine sister were born, as daughters of ex military parents.  Unfortunately Vivian was born with a rare autoimmune disease that caused her body to attack her own organs, which would force her to spend most of her childhood and teen age years bedridden. The time in the hospital gave Vivian a lot of time to read books and play strategy games, as she quickly grew interest in the military like her parents.

As her condition worsen and threatened her life, her family made the hard choice of admitting her into Dr. Esat's experimental program, where they would replace a vast majority of her body with cybernetics over the years. Vivian lived on, but it would forther change the course of her life
